content.p: We are home to leading experts on commercial law, with a commitment to research excellence. Our research makes a positive impact on commercial law reform and development both nationally and internationally. We are committed to the promotion of research excellence in the field of commercial law. We are home to leading commercial law experts who develop thinking and practice in a diverse range of areas including business and human rights, consumer law, insolvency, maritime law, commercial litigation, intellectual property, and the impact of Covid-19. Our research provides robust and evidenced findings which are at the forefront of the field. Our commitment to engagement and impact ensures that our research projects are developed and delivered with policy makers, international organisations, civil society, practitioners, and the global community. Subscribe Follow us on Twitter Join us on LinkedIn email: unclc@nottingham.ac.uk
